title: Reddit
cleaned_text: [r/autism](/r/autism/) WE ARE PROTESTING REDDITS API THIRD PARTY APP INCREASE. Please Google this subject for more info. Fuck you /u/spez. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Autism news, information and support. Please feel free to submit articles to enhance the knowledge, acceptance, understanding and research of Autism and ASD. Everything I got for Christmas was crystals and healing stuff because she said it would cure my autism. I already told her I don't believe in the healing crystals or healing magic and she got me hundreds of dollars of crystals anyway. She also complains of having very little money. Idk why she has a $1200 phone. She is trying to take away my meds and make me use healing crystals. My dad thinks it's BS and so do I.
